source_sentence: 虗空無量故(色蘊)等亦無量。

source_sentence: 〔日〕第八十一(之五)　『主』(布施起異生終)改品『默』(色起至異生地終)『持定』(並色起至異生地法終)『魔』(我起至真如終)。
translation: [Sun] 81st (no. 5) 'Lord' (end of rebirth from generosity), 'change of class,' 'silence' (end of birth in the form realm, 'concentration' (end of birth in the form realm, and end of birth in the Dharma realm), and 'Māra' (end of birth in the self realm).

source_sentence: 第八十二(之二)　『魔』(布施起無為終)『兵』改品『自』(色起空不空至真如界終)。
translation: (form arises and emptiness doesn't reach the end of the realm of true reality), and 'Māra' (generosity arises and ends in the level of nonbeing).

source_sentence: 第八十三(之三)　『自』(布施起至極喜地終)。
translation: 83(ter) 'Itself' (the arising of generosity to the end of the stage of ultimate bliss).

source_sentence: 第八十五(之一)　改品『隕銷寶』(俱色起並至聲聞終)『掌』(色起至地界終)。
translation: Exhortation 85(1): 'Meteorite (Arising from both form and reaching the end of the śrāvaka stage)' and 'Palm' (Arising from form and reaching the end of the earth realm).

source_sentence: 第八十六(之二)　『掌』(苦諦起聲聞終)『摩尼』(色起至聲聞終)『珠』(布施起至聲聞乘終)。
translation: Exh. 86(bis) 'Palm' (arising from the truth of suffering and ending with the disciples) 'Mani' (arising from form and ending with the disciples) 'Jewel' (arising from generosity and ending with the disciples).

source_sentence: 第八十七(之三)　『五』(布施起聲聞終)『彩應方』(並色起同聲聞乘終)。
translation: 87(ter) 'five' (arising from generosity to the end of the śrāvaka path) 'colors that respond to direction' (arising from form to the end of the śrāvaka path).

source_sentence: 第八十八(之四)　『現天』(並色起同聲聞乘終)『宮』(色起至耳界終)。
translation: 88(d) 'The present heaven' (which also has form that rises to the end of the śrāvaka vehicle) and 'the palace' (which has form that rises to the end of the ear realm).

source_sentence: 第八十九(之五)　『宮』(鼻界起聲聞終)正經改品『共』(無依處起至眼界終)。
translation: 89(5) 'The palace' (rising from the nose realm and ending with the śrāvaka vehicle) and the correct sūtras change to 'shared' (rising from a non-dependent place and ending with the eye realm).

source_sentence: 第九十(之二)　『共』(耳界起至四靜慮終)。
translation: The ninetieth (bis) 'Common' (arising in the ear realm and ending in the four states of meditation).

source_sentence: 〔月〕第九十一(之三)　『共』(八解脫起聲聞乘終)。
translation: [Moon] 91(ter) 'Common' (arising from the eight liberations and ending with the śrāvaka vehicle).

source_sentence: 第九十二(之四)　『食』(色起至布施終)。
translation: 92(d) 'Food' (from the arising of form to the end of generosity).

source_sentence: 第九十三(之五)　『食』(四靜慮起聲聞乘終)結經。
translation: Sutra 93(5) 'Food' (beginning with the four meditations and ending with the śrāvaka vehicle).

source_sentence: 第九十四(之六)　『器』(色起一切智終)。
translation: 94(6) 'Vessel' (form arises to the end of omniscience).

source_sentence: 第九十五(之七)　『器』(陀羅尼起聲聞乘終)真如(色起至真如終)。
translation: 95(no. 7) 'Vessel' (beginning with the dhāraṇī and ending with the śrāvaka vehicle) and 'true thusness' (beginning with form and ending with true thusness).

source_sentence: 第九十六(之八)　真如(布施起聲聞終)法性(色起至耳界終)。
translation: Ninety-six (no. 8) 'True Being' (beginning with almsgiving and ending with the śrāvaka vehicle) and 'Dharma nature' (beginning with form and ending with the auditory realm).

source_sentence: 第九十七(之九)　法性(鼻界起至預流向終)。
translation: Ninety-seventh (ninth) Dharma nature (arising in the nose realm and ending in the direction of stream-winner).

source_sentence: 第九十八(之十)　法性(獨覺起聲聞終)改品『百』(色起至聲聞終)『味』(色起陀羅尼終)。
translation: The ninety-eighth (decimal) Dharma nature (from the solitary realizer to the end of the śrāvaka path) is modified by the qualities 'hundred' (from the arising of form to the end of the śrāvaka path) and 'taste' (from the arising of form to the end of the dhāraṇī path).

source_sentence: 菩薩摩訶薩所行般若波羅蜜多。
translation: The prajñāpāramitā practiced by the bodhisattvas, the mahāsattvas, is also said to be limitless (up to the śrāvaka vehicle's mindfulness of the prior).

source_sentence: 亦說無邊(至聲聞乘念前憍尸迦)(無邊故結)。

source_sentence: 第九十九(二十八之二)　無量故(預流起)至(聲聞乘)無邊故(色起聲聞乘)。
